security.csp: default-src 'self' blob: data:; connect-src 'self' https://firestore.googleapis.com https://firebasestorage.googleapis.com https://identitytoolkit.googleapis.com https://securetoken.googleapis.com; img-src 'self' asset: data: blob: https://firebasestorage.googleapis.com; frame-src 'self' blob: https://firebasestorage.googleapis.com; style-src 'self' 'unsafe-inline'; script-src 'self' 'unsafe-inline';
